You can get ahead in life and still be kind. Be a fighter without being a bully. Swim without being a shark. Be vulnerable and still be strong. Step up without stepping on and over others. You can live with love for self and others.

If you constantly give of yourself and are repeatedly taken advantage of, the burden lies on your shoulders to create boundaries and stick to them. Its far more difficult than it seems but also extremely rewarding in gaining quality of life.
We have little control over how much others care for us. We have much more control about how much we care for ourselves and others.
Each road you travel will be filled with those who tell you that you cant or you can. It is your choice to decide whether you wont or you will.

If the Fed does not pivot, the set-up will be more like 1929. The Fed raised rates in 1929 to squelch financial speculation and then, in 1930, Congress passed Smoot-Hawley, putting 50%+ tariffs on more than 20,000 goods and pushing the global economy into the Great Depression.

When central banks intervene to prop up their own bonds, they cripple the capital markets and collapse their own currencies. Sovereign debt is an increasingly ineffective treasury reserve asset. Bitcoin offers a sound economic & ethical alternative.
